content.question: What does Haitao say about the recipient’s upcoming visit to the United States?

choices.label: It will offer a good chance to see cherry blossoms.
The weather will probably be very hot.
The original plan to visit last year was postponed.
It will be good for the recipient’s health.

content.answer: It will offer a good chance to see cherry blossoms.
